printSettings.listItem: select F_TASK_STATUSNAME(status) Status,TASKID,CaseSn,F_REC_INFOSOURCENAME(infosourceid) infosource,address ,to_char(discovertime,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') discovertime,imagefilename,coordx,coordy,PartSn,KeeperSn,Address,F_REC_DEPTNAME_BYDeptcode(deptcode) DeptName, Fn_GetStreetName(StreetCode) StreetCode,fn_getcommunityname(CommunityCode) CommunityCode,GridCode, f_workgridcode_bygridcode(gridCode) WorkGridCode,Description,ImageFileName,CheckImage, F_REC_INFOTYPENAME(INFOTYPEID) infotype,F_REC_IBC_NAME(INFOBCCODE,INFOTYPEID) infobc,F_REC_ISC_NAME(INFOBCCODE,INFOSCCODE,INFOTYPEID) infosc from t_info_main where taskid='{0}'

SELECT F_WORKGRIDCODE_BYGRIDCODE(a.GRIDCODE) NEWWORKCODE, a.STATUS StatusCode,F_MAIN_STATUS(a.STATUS) STATUSNAME,a.GRIDCODE GRIDCODE,To_Char(a.DISCOVERTIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:Mi') DISCOVERTIME,a.CaseSn CaseSn, F_REC_INFOSOURCENAME(a.infosourceid) infosource, F_REC_INFOTYPENAME(a.INFOTYPEID) infotype, a.TASKID TASKID,a.KEEPERSN KEEPERSN,a.COORDX COORDX,a.COORDY COORDY,F_REC_COMMUNITYNAME(a.COMMUNITYCODE) COMMUNITYCODE, F_REC_STREETNAME(a.STREETCODE) STREETCODE,a.PARTSN PARTSN,F_REC_IBC_NAME(a.INFOBCCODE, a.INFOTYPEID) InfoBCCODE,F_REC_ISC_NAME(a.INFOBCCODE,a.INFOSCCODE,a.INFOTYPEID) INFOSCCODE,F_REC_ITYPENAME(a.INFOTYPEID) InfoTypeID, F_REC_PSTATETEXT(a.PARTSTATE),F_REC_INFOSOURCENAME(a.INFOSOURCEID) InfoSourceID,a.DESCRIPTION DESCRIPTION, a.ADDRESS STANDARDADDRESS,a.IMAGEFILENAME IMAGEFILENAME,a.WAVFILENAME WAVFILENAME,a.CHECKIMAGE CHECKIMAGE,a.CHECKWAV CHECKWAV, b.REPORTPERSON REPORTPERSON, b.CONTACTMODE CONTACTMODE FROM T_INFO_MAIN a join T_INFO_INPUT b on a.taskid = b.taskid WHERE a.TASKID='{0}' ORDER BY A.ID DESC

SELECT F_REC_DEPTNAME(DeptCode) DeptName,F_REC_USERNAME(USERID) USERNAME, to_Char(INSERTTIME,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi') InsertTime, F_REC_ITYPENAME(INFOTYPEID) TYPENAME ,F_REC_IBC_NAME(INFOBCCODE,INFOTYPEID) BIG ,F_REC_ISC_NAME(INFOBCCODE,INFOSCCODE,INFOTYPEID) SMALL,INFOBCCODE, INFOSCCODE, TASKADDR, TASKDESC, COORDINEX, COORDINEY, KEEPERSN FROM T_INFO_SENDTOPDA WHERE TASKID= '{0}' AND TASKTYPE=2 order by id desc

SELECT KEEPERSN, GRIDCODE,F_REC_ITYPENAME(INFOTYPEID) TYPENAME ,F_REC_ISC_NAME(INFOBCCODE,INFOSCCODE,INFOTYPEID) SMALL, F_REC_IBC_NAME(INFOBCCODE,INFOTYPEID) BIG , to_char(DESCRIPTION) DESCRIPTION,F_REC_USERNAME(INSERTUSER) INSERTUSERNAME, to_Char(UPLOADTIME,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi') UploadTime, PARTSN, COORDX, COORDY, CHECKRESULT, IMAGEFILENAME, WAVFILENAME, UPDATETIME , CASE WHEN CHECKRESULT = 1 THEN '属实' else '不属实' END NEWRESULT,PHOTONUMBER,VOICENUMBER FROM T_INFO_PDA WHERE TASKID= '{0}' AND UPLOADTYPE=2 order by id desc

SELECT F_REC_DEPTNAME(DeptCode) DeptName,F_REC_USERNAME(USERID) NAME, F_REC_ITYPENAME(INFOTYPEID) TYPENAME, F_REC_IBC_NAME(INFOBCCODE,INFOTYPEID) BIG,F_REC_ISC_NAME(INFOBCCODE,INFOSCCODE,INFOTYPEID) SMALL, to_Char(INSERTTIME,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi') InsertTime, PARTSN, F_REC_PSTATETEXT(PARTSTATE) STATE, NOTE FROM T_INFO_PERCREATE WHERE TASKID ='{0}' ORDER BY ID DESC

SELECT F_REC_DEPTNAME(DeptCode) DeptName,PARTSN,F_REC_USERNAME(USERID) NAME ,to_Char(INSERTTIME,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi') InsertTime,F_REC_IBC_NAME(INFOBCCODE,INFOTYPEID) BIG, F_REC_ISC_NAME(INFOBCCODE, INFOSCCODE, INFOTYPEID) SMALL,F_REC_PSTATETEXT(PARTSTATE) STATE, to_Char(INSERTTIME,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi') Time, F_REC_ITYPENAME(INFOTYPEID) NEWTYPE,CREATENOTE NOTE FROM T_INFO_CREATE WHERE TASKID = '{0}' ORDER BY ID DESC

select F_REC_USERNAME(USERID) NAME, DISPATCHNOTE, F_REC_DEPTNAME_BYTASKID(taskid) solvingdepts, CARRIVETIME, CSOLVINGTIME, CArriveTime, CSolvingTIme,to_Char(LASTARRIVETIME,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi') LASTARRIVETIME,to_Char(LASTSOLVINGTIME,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi') LASTSOLVINGTIME, F_DISPATCH_PARTMAIN(id) MainDept,F_DISPATCH_PARTSUB(id) SubDepts,F_REC_DEPTNAME(DeptCode) DeptName, to_Char(INSERTTIME,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi') InsertTime from t_info_dispatch dispatch where taskid='{0}' order by ID DESC

SELECT F_REC_DEPTNAME_BYUSERID(acceptuserid) acceptdept, to_Char(ACCEPTTIME,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi') AcceptTime ,ACCEPTNOTE, ARRIVETIME, SOLVINGTIME,ARRIVEPERSON, SOLVINGPERSON,SOLVINGRESULT ,ACCEPTNOTE || '(' ||F_SOLVING_STATUS(STATUS) || ')' NEWACCEPTNOTE,CARRIVETIME, CSOLVINGTIME, F_REC_USERNAME(UPDATEUSER) SOLVINGNAME,F_REC_USERNAME(ACCEPTUSERID) ACCEPTNAME, F_REC_INFOTYPEID_TASKID(TASKID)NEWTYPE, F_REC_IBC_NAME(INFOSBCCODE,F_REC_INFOTYPEID_TASKID(TASKID)) BIG, UPDATETIME,SOLVINGNOTE, F_REC_ISC_NAME(INFOSBCCODE,INFOSSCCODE,F_REC_INFOTYPEID_TASKID(TASKID)) SMALL ,F_REC_INFOTYPENAME_TASKID(TASKID) TYPENAME ,STATUS from t_info_solving solving, ( select recordid from t_info_track where operatetype='16' and taskid='{0}' ) take where solving.id=take.recordid order by ID DESC

SELECT F_REC_DEPTNAME_BYUSERID(A.solvingUSERID) solvingdept,A.acceptTIME, A.SOLVINGTIME,A.SWRITETIME, A.solvingNOTE,F_REC_INFOTYPENAME_TASKID(A.TASKID) TYPENAME , F_REC_DEPTNAME(A.EXECUTEDEPTCODE) EXECUTEDEPT, to_Char(A.ARRIVETIME,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi') ArriveTime,to_Char(A.SOLVINGTIME,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi') SOLVINGTIME, A.ARRIVEPERSON, A.SOLVINGPERSON,A.SOLVINGRESULT ,A.solvingNOTE || '(' ||F_SOLVING_STATUS(A.STATUS) || ')' NEWsolvingNOTE,A.CARRIVETIME, A.CSOLVINGTIME, F_REC_USERNAME(A.solvingUSERid) SOLVINGNAME,F_REC_USERNAME(A.ACCEPTUSERID) ACCEPTNAME, F_REC_INFOTYPEID_TASKID(A.TASKID)NEWTYPE, F_REC_USERNAME(A.ACCEPTUSERID) NEWACCEPTNAME, ACCEPTTIME NEWACCEPTTIME, F_REC_IBC_NAME(A.INFOSBCCODE,F_REC_INFOTYPEID_TASKID(A.TASKID)) BIG, to_Char(A.UPDATETIME,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi') UpdateTime, F_REC_ISC_NAME(A.INFOSBCCODE,A.INFOSSCCODE,F_REC_INFOTYPEID_TASKID(A.TASKID)) SMALL,FN_GET_CODENAME (TO_CHAR (A.MANYITYPE), '017') MANYITYPE,F_GETHUIFUSTYLE(A.HUIFUSTYLE) HUIFUSTYLE FROM T_INFO_SOLVING A,T_DEPTSINFO B WHERE A.EXECUTEDEPTCODE =B.DEPTCODE AND B.DEPTTYPE = '4' and (A.ISQIANGDU is null or A.ISQIANGDU <>1) AND A.TASKID ='{0}' AND A.STATUS=2 ORDER BY ACCEPTTIME DESC

SELECT A.SUPERVISENOTE NOTE, to_Char(A.INSERTTIME,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:Mi') TIME, B.USERNAME NAME, F_REC_DEPTNAME(A.DeptCode) DeptName FROM T_INFO_SUPERVISE A JOIN T_USER B ON A.USERID=B.USERCARDID WHERE A.TASKID='{0}' ORDER BY A.ID DESC

SELECT F_REC_USERNAME(USERID) USERNAME,KEEPERSN, to_Char(SENDTIME,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi') SendTIme ,F_REC_ITYPENAME(INFOTYPEID) TYPENAME ,INFOTYPEID, F_REC_ISC_NAME(INFOBCCODE,INFOSCCODE,INFOBCCODE) SMALL, F_REC_IBC_NAME(INFOBCCODE,INFOBCCODE) BIG , TASKADDR, TASKDESC, UPDATETIME,COORDINEX, COORDINEY,INSERTTIME FROM T_INFO_SENDTOPDA WHERE TASKID= '{0}' AND TASKTYPE=1 ORDER BY ID DESC

(SELECT KEEPERSN, GRIDCODE, F_REC_ITYPENAME (INFOTYPEID) TYPENAME, F_REC_ISC_NAME (INFOBCCODE, INFOSCCODE, INFOTYPEID) SMALL, F_REC_IBC_NAME (INFOBCCODE, INFOTYPEID) BIG, TO_CHAR (DESCRIPTION) DESCRIPTION, F_REC_USERNAME (INSERTUSER) INSERTUSERNAME, TO_CHAR (UPLOADTIME, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi') UploadTime, PARTSN, COORDX, COORDY, CHECKRESULT, IMAGEFILENAME, WAVFILENAME, UPDATETIME, CASE WHEN CHECKRESULT = 1 THEN '完成' ELSE '未完成' END NEWRESULT, PHOTONUMBER, VOICENUMBER FROM T_INFO_PDA WHERE TASKID = '{0}' AND UPLOADTYPE = 1 UNION ALL SELECT F_REC_USERNAME (UPDATEUSER) KEEPERSN, '' GRIDCODE, F_REC_ITYPENAME (INFOTYPEID) TYPENAME, F_REC_ISC_NAME (INFOBCCODE, INFOSCCODE, INFOTYPEID) SMALL, F_REC_IBC_NAME (INFOBCCODE, INFOTYPEID) BIG, note DESCRIPTION, F_REC_USERNAME (INSERTUSER) INSERTUSERNAME, TO_CHAR (UPDATETIME, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi') UploadTime, '' PARTSN, COORDINEX COORDX, COORDINEY COORDY, CHECKRESULT, '' IMAGEFILENAME, '' WAVFILENAME, UPDATETIME, CASE WHEN CHECKRESULT = 1 THEN '完成' ELSE '未完成' END NEWRESULT, 0 PHOTONUMBER, 0 VOICENUMBER FROM T_INFO_SENDTODEPT WHERE TASKID = '{0}' AND TASKTYPE = 1 and STATUS=1) ORDER BY UPDATETIME DESC

SELECT A.ENDRESULT ENDRESULT,FN_GET_CODENAME(A.CASEVALUATION,'012') CASEVALUATION,A.ENDNOTE NOTE, to_Char(A.INSERTTIME,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi') TIME, B.USERNAME NAME ,F_REC_DEPTNAME(a.DeptCode) DeptName FROM T_INFO_END A JOIN T_USER B ON A.USERID=B.USERCARDID WHERE TASKID='{0}' ORDER BY A.ID DESC
SELECT F_REC_USERNAME(USERID) USERNAME, CANCELNOTE, to_Char(INSERTTIME,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi') INSERTTIME, F_REC_DEPTNAME_BYUSERID(USERID) DEPTNAME FROM T_INFO_CANCEL WHERE TASKID='{0}'

SELECT F_REC_USERNAME(REQUESTUSERID) INPUTNAME,F_REC_DEPTNAME_BYUSERID(REQUESTUSERID) DEPTNAME, REQUESTNOTE, to_CHar(REQUESTDATE,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi') RequestDate, CASE WHEN length(DELAYHOURS) =1 THEN '缓办' ELSE '延期' || F_FORMATDAYSTOMINUTES(DELAYHOURS,INFOSOURCEID,main.URGENTDEGREE,F_REC_MainIsStandard(MAIN.INFOBCCODE,MAIN.INFOSCCODE,MAIN.INFOZCCODE, MAIN.INFOTYPEID)) END DELAYTYPE FROM T_INFO_DELAY delay,t_info_solving solving ,t_info_main main WHERE delay.recordid=solving.id and solving.taskid=main.taskid and delay.TASKID='{0}' ORDER BY REQUESTDATE DESC

SELECT F_REC_USERNAME(CHECKUSERID) INPUTNAME,F_REC_DEPTNAME_BYUSERID(CHECKUSERID) DEPTNAME, CHECKNOTE, to_CHar(CHECKDATE,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi') CHECKDATE, CASE WHEN length(DELAYHOURS) =1 THEN '缓办' ELSE '延期' END DELAYTYPE, F_DELAY_STATUS(delay.CHECKRESULT) CHECKRESULTTYPE,F_FORMATDAYSTOMINUTES(DELAYHOURS,INFOSOURCEID,main.URGENTDEGREE,F_REC_MainIsStandard(MAIN.INFOBCCODE,MAIN.INFOSCCODE,MAIN.INFOZCCODE, MAIN.INFOTYPEID)) DELAYHOURS FROM T_INFO_DELAY delay,t_info_solving solving ,t_info_main main WHERE delay.recordid=solving.id and solving.taskid=main.taskid and delay.TASKID='{0}' AND delay.CHECKRESULT IN (1,2) ORDER BY CHECKDATE DESC

SELECT F_REC_DEPTNAME_BYUSERID(RejectUserID) RejectDept, to_Char(RejectTIME,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi') RejectTIME, ARRIVETIME, SOLVINGTIME,ARRIVEPERSON, SOLVINGPERSON,SOLVINGRESULT ,RejectNOTE || '(' ||F_SOLVING_STATUS(STATUS) || ')' RejectNOTE,CARRIVETIME, CSOLVINGTIME, F_REC_USERNAME(RejectUserID) RejectNAME, F_REC_IBC_NAME(INFOSBCCODE,F_REC_INFOTYPEID_TASKID(TASKID)) BIG, to_Char(UPDATETIME,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi') UPdateTime, F_REC_ISC_NAME(INFOSBCCODE,INFOSSCCODE,F_REC_INFOTYPEID_TASKID(TASKID)) SMALL ,F_REC_INFOTYPENAME_TASKID(TASKID) TYPENAME , STATUS from t_info_solving solving, ( select recordid from t_info_track where operatetype='17' and taskid='{0}' ) take where solving.id=take.recordid ORDER BY REJECTTIME DESC

select F_REC_USERNAME(USERID) USERNAME, BACKNOTE, to_Char(UPDATETIME,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi') UPDATETIME,to_Char(INSERTTIME,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi') INSERTTIME, F_REC_DEPTNAME_BYDeptcode(deptcode) DeptName from t_info_back back, ( select recordid from t_info_track where operatetype='10' and taskid='{0}' )track where back.id=track.recordid ORDER BY BACK.ID DESC

select F_REC_USERNAME(USERID) USERNAME, BACKNOTE, to_Char(UPDATETIME,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi') UPDATETIME,to_Char(INSERTTIME,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi') INSERTTIME, F_REC_DEPTNAME_BYDeptcode(deptcode) DeptName from t_info_back back, ( select recordid from t_info_track where operatetype='3' and taskid='{0}' )track where back.id=track.recordid ORDER BY BACK.ID DESC

select F_REC_USERNAME(USERID) USERNAME, BACKNOTE, to_Char(UPDATETIME,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi') UPDATETIME,to_Char(INSERTTIME,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi') INSERTTIME, F_REC_DEPTNAME_BYDeptcode(deptcode) DeptName from t_info_back back, ( select recordid from t_info_track where operatetype='5' and taskid='{0}' )track where back.id=track.recordid ORDER BY BACK.ID DESC

select F_REC_USERNAME(USERID) USERNAME, BACKNOTE, to_Char(UPDATETIME,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi') UPDATETIME,to_Char(INSERTTIME,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi') INSERTTIME, F_REC_DEPTNAME_BYDeptcode(deptcode) DeptName from t_info_back back, ( select recordid from t_info_track where operatetype='15' and taskid='{0}' )track where back.id=track.recordid ORDER BY BACK.ID DESC

SELECT A.INERTVIEW NOTE, to_Char(A.INSERTTIME,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi') TIME, B.USERNAME NAME ,F_REC_DEPTNAME(a.DeptCode) DeptName, CASE ISFIRSTCONTRACT WHEN 1 THEN '是' WHEN 2 THEN '无法回访' ELSE '否' END ISFIRSTCONTRACT, CASE WHEN ISREPLY = 1 THEN '是' ELSE '否' END ISREPLY, FN_GET_CODENAME (TO_CHAR (A.ISSOLVING), CASE A.VISITTYPE WHEN 1 THEN '026' ELSE '045' END) ISSOLVING, FN_GET_CODENAME (TO_CHAR (A.RESULTTYPE), '026') RESULTTYPE, FN_GET_CODENAME (TO_CHAR (A.TELASKTYPE), '009') TELASKTYPE, FN_GET_CODENAME (TO_CHAR (A.USEREVALUATE ), '075') USEREVALUATE, FN_GET_CODENAME (TO_CHAR (A.TDMANYI ), '075') TDMANYI , FN_GET_CODENAME (TO_CHAR (A.ALLMANYI ), '075') ALLMANYI, FN_GET_CODENAME (TO_CHAR (A.GCMANYI ), '075') GCMANYI FROM t_info_telask A JOIN T_USER B ON A.INSERTUSER=B.USERCARDID WHERE TASKID='{0}' ORDER BY A.ID DESC

SELECT (CASE FIRST_CONTACT WHEN '1' THEN '已联' WHEN '0' THEN '未联' END) FIRST_CONTACT, TO_CHAR (FEEDBACKTIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') FEEDBACKTIME, FIRST_CONTACTOR, FN_GET_CODENAME (FACT, '066') FACT, FACT_EXPLAIN, REPLY_POINT, FN_GET_CODENAME (REPLY_TYPE, '013') REPLY_TYPE, TO_CHAR (REPLY_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') REPLY_TIME, FN_GET_CODENAME (IS_PUBLIC, '069') IS_PUBLIC, LEVEL2_HANDLER, LEVEL2_CHARGER, BADGING_UNIT, FN_GET_CODENAME (BANLIRESULT, '022') BANLIRESULT12345, TO_CHAR (ARRIVETIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') ARRIVETIME, FN_GET_CODENAME (APPEAL, '067') APPEAL, APPEAL_EXPLAIN, DESCRIPTION, F_REC_USERNAME (INSERTUSER) INSERTUSER, TO_CHAR (INSERTTIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') INSERTTIME, FN_SRLH_REPLACEWORD (BANLIRESULT, '5') BANLIRESULTGreen, CJPERSON, FN_SRLH_REPLACEWORD (ISTRUE, '6') ISTRUE, FN_SRLH_REPLACEWORD (ISHUIFU, '7') ISHUIFU, FN_SRLH_REPLACEWORD (HUIFUWAY, '8') HUIFUWAY, SOLVINGRECORDER, FN_SRLH_REPLACEWORD (GREENRESPONSIBILITY, '19') GREENRESPONSIBILITY, FN_SRLH_REPLACEWORD (VISITRESULT, '9') VISITRESULT, TO_CHAR (FEEDBACKTIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') FEEDBACKTIME, FN_SRLH_REPLACEWORD (BACKTYPE, '12') BACKTYPE, OPTYPE, FN_GET_CODENAME (SATISFIED, '017') SATISFIED FROM T_Hotline_Feedback WHERE T_Hotline_Feedback.TASKID = '{0}' ORDER BY T_Hotline_Feedback.ID DESC
